Articles.Content:
Hello, i'm Dcseal, and, I joined this forum, because i play this game. but i'm not very good at it.

The only achivements i've had In KSP, Are,

Sucessful Orbital jump to one of the Arctic poles, After 3 failed attempts of burning up in Re-entry

Stranding Jebadiah Kerman, by trying to do a orbit around kerbin, then acdiently escaping kerbins gravity, Then doing a orbit around the sun.

Making it to the abadoned airfield around 20 times.

And orbiting kerbin. (The 2nd time round)

So i joined this forum for some help

Because the thing about ksp

Is theres so much gameplay with the planets, Amazing SSTOS, Bases,

and Bringing ASTERIODS Back into kerbin with no mods, Thats locked away because i can only orbit, orbital jump, and fly.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
You're not bad at the game if you can make orbit. Everybody has to start somewhere. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

If you're in orbit, you're halfway to anywhere. Welcome aboard!

Check out the Tutorials subforum for help!

Oh yes. I still remember my first Mun "landing." Which took more tries than I'd care to admit. What made it extra painful was that I didn't even know there was a save option. (Yes, to all the old heads. I know it wasn't always there "back in your day.")

Welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw

> 
> that I didn't even know there was a save option.

Wait, There's a Save option?

.....

DANGIT!!![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)

F5 saves, F9 loads. You can also hold the MOD key (ALT in windows) and press F5 to name the save. Then ALT+F9 to load from your list of saves.

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Thanks so much for telling me. i landed on the mun.

After lots and lots and lots and lots of cups of water, and quicksaves.
